entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
